mapper.select: select /* com.anjump.ant.qna.dao.QNAMapper#selectQNATotal() */ count(*) from tbl_qnas a left join tbl_qna_categories b on (a.fk_qnacategories_qnas = b.qna_category_no) left join tbl_qna_files c on (a.qna_id = c.fk_qnas_files) where qna_status = 'n'

select /* com.anjump.ant.qna.dao.QNAMapper#selectQNAListWithPaging(SelectCriteria selectCriteria) */ a.qna_id , a.qna_title , a.qna_modify_time , a.qna_depth , a.qna_status , a.ref_qna_id , b.qna_category_no , b.qna_category_name , c.member_id , c.member_name , d.admin_id , d.admin_name from tbl_qnas a left join tbl_qna_categories b on(a.fk_qnacategories_qnas = b.qna_category_no) left join tbl_members c on (a.fk_members_qnas = c.member_id) left join tbl_admins d on(a.fk_admins_qnas = d.admin_id) where a.qna_delete_yn = 'N' limit #{ startRow }, #{ limit }

select /* com.anjump.ant.qna.dao.QNAMapper#selectQNA(String qnaId) */ a.qna_id , a.qna_title , a.qna_content , a.qna_modify_time , a.qna_depth , a.qna_status , a.ref_qna_id , b.qna_category_no , b.qna_category_name , c.qna_file_id , c.qna_file_url , d.member_id , d.member_name from tbl_qnas a left join tbl_qna_categories b on(a.fk_qnacategories_qnas = b.qna_category_no) left join tbl_qna_files c on(a.qna_id = c.fk_qnas_files) left join tbl_members d on(a.fk_members_qnas = d.member_id) where qna_delete_yn = 'N' and qna_id = #{ qnaId }
mapper.update: update /* com.anjump.ant.qna.dao.QNAMapper#deleteQNA(String qnaId) */ tbl_qnas set qna_delete_yn = 'Y' where qna_id = #{ qnaId }
